official_title: MRI Screening in Men at High Risk of Developing Prostate Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Male age 18 and older
* No known history of prostate cancer
* No previous prostate resection or ablation (e.g. TURP, photovaporization)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unable to tolerate MRI due to metal fragments or claustrophobia
* Lack of a rectum
* Hip arthroplasty
